alert.note: Alert for Stokes; Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Surry, southern Stokes and Yadkin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Capella to near Yadkinville. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yadkinville... Walnut Cove... East Bend... Danbury... King... Nebo... and Huntsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
